Room.Name: Eidenhoft Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Eidenhoft Boulevard, which runs diagonally through town.
Room.LongDescription: Eidenhoft Boulevard was named after Edmund Eidenhoft, the premire architech who designed most of Oceancrest. The road runs diagonally through the southern portion of town as to provide a very quick path from the southwest corner to the Arena and other notable buildings towards the center of town.
